requirements.summary: Build chat interface with message list and input area
acceptanceCriteria: Messages display in chronological order with sender identification
User can type and submit messages via input field
Submitted messages appear in the conversation view

file_operations.description: Create the main chat interface component that displays the conversation history as a scrollable message list and includes a text input area with a send button for submitting new messages. Use modern React patterns with state management for input handling.

Create a message list component that renders chat messages in chronological order, distinguishing between user and assistant messages with visual styling. Display timestamp information for each message.
Create a message input component containing a textarea for typing messages and a send button. Handle form submission and clear input after sending.
Wire the ChatInterface component into the main app, replacing any existing placeholder content. Ensure the chat interface is the primary view of the application.

requirements.summary: Implement message sending functionality with backend integration
acceptanceCriteria: User messages are sent to backend when submitted
Chat interface updates immediately after sending

file_operations.description: Create a custom hook using React Query to fetch all chat messages from the backend via the getAll method and provide methods to send new messages using the send backend method. Handle loading states and automatic refetching after mutations to ensure the UI updates immediately.

Integrate the useChatMessages hook to fetch and display messages from the backend. Wire the message sending functionality to call the backend send method when the user submits a message, passing the Sender enum value for 'user'.

requirements.summary: Apply modern chat design with professional color scheme
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses a cohesive color palette that is not blue or purple
Layout is clean with proper spacing and visual hierarchy
Overall aesthetic is professional and contemporary

file_operations.description: Update the Tailwind configuration to define a modern color palette using green and neutral tones (avoiding blue and purple). Configure typography settings for a contemporary, readable font stack.

Apply global styling with the new color scheme, ensuring a clean professional aesthetic. Set base typography styles for readability and establish consistent spacing patterns throughout the application.

Style the message list with proper spacing, visual hierarchy, and distinct styling for user vs assistant messages using the new color palette. Ensure messages have clean borders, appropriate padding, and professional appearance.
Apply modern styling to the input area with clean borders, proper spacing, and a professional send button design using the new color scheme.
Style the overall chat interface layout with a clean, contemporary design. Ensure proper spacing, visual hierarchy, and a cohesive application of the new color palette throughout the component.
